did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes materials concerning studies of New England and the Colorado River Basin; a program and an abstract for the 30th North American Meeting of the Regional Science Association; and correspondence between its director, William H. Miernyk, and Charles Tiebout.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes materials concerning studies of New England and the Colorado River Basin; a program and an abstract for the 30th North American Meeting of the Regional Science Association; and correspondence between its director, William H. Miernyk, and Charles Tiebout.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Regional Science Association. Records, #4071. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of two boxes. Online guide unavailable.
